tasks.label: Build VST3 (Debug) + Install to System VST3 Folder
args: cmake --build build --config Debug --target PLUGIN_NAME_VST3; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force "${workspaceFolder}\build\PLUGIN_NAME_artefacts\Debug\VST3\PLUGIN_NAME.vst3" "C:\Program Files\Common Files\VST3\"
